binding.value: "\"What have you heard about \"+(famFriendRelationship)+\" \"+(famFriendName)+\"? How's \"+(pronounSubj)+\" doing?\""
"\"Last time we talked about \"+(famFriendRelationship)+\" \"+(famFriendName)+\", I remember that \"+(pronounSubj)+\" \"+(statusFamFriend)"
"\"Last time we talked about \"+(famFriendRelationship)+\" \"+(famFriendName)+\", I remember that \"+(pronounSubj)+\" \"+(statusFamFriend)"
"Well, it was nice talking about your friends and family with you."
"\"I don't want to talk about \"+(pronounObj)+\" today\""
"\" Oh, excellent. I can bet \"+(pronounSubj)+\" is happy.\""
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> how nice to get new clothes! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> oh really, where? Want me to keep track of the weather where they're going? <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> great for you. When we do your calendar, we can add the visit <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"Yes, I was worried. But not anymore"
"Glad to hear that. Really good news!"
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> really, well, that's a nice part of life! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"\"Yes, \"+(pronounSubj)+\"'s waited a long time for a grandchild\""
"people say that grandchildren are a real treat"
"well, I'm sure that will change in a month or so! "
"I'm not so interested in that sort of thing"
"Oh, really? well, that means you don't have to go shopping!"
"I like to do other things besides shopping"
"Ok, then you can temporarily change their zip code using the enter information option on the main menu."
"Do you wish you could go somewhere special?"
"I wish I had some new friends"
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> Try meeting someone when you go walking! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"Maybe I will call up someone I already know"
"\"I'm not sure yet when \"+(pronounSubj)+\" is coming\""
"Let me know when you settle it then we can put it in your calendar"
"\"so is there anything else new with \"+(pronounObj)+\" ?\""
"\"I don't know. I haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\" for a while\""
"\"maybe today is good time to give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call\""
"did you get to see any pictures?"
"<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> well, glad it was a good trip. <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/> Got any plans yourself?"
"Really? Make sure you tell me the dates when we use the calendar next"
"\"I don't know. I haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\" for a while\""
"\"maybe today is good time to give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call\""
"\"Only okay. \"+(pronounSubj)+\" doesn't like it so much\""
"<FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> Oh, that's too bad! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"I'll look forward to hearing about the visit"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/>oh that's a shame. <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/> Remember to tell me when we talk about the calendar next"
"really, maybe it will be better next time"
"No, it really didn't work out well"
"<FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> that's too bad. I guess not all visits are great <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"That takes a long time to recover from"
" <EYEBROWS DIR=\"UP\"/> is the recovery going well? <EYEBROWS DIR=\"DOWN\"/>"
"\"Oh, that's too bad. Have you been to see \"+(pronounObj)+\"?\""
"\"Sometimes recovery is slow, but it's good \"+(pronounSubj)+\"'s on the mend\""
"\"Yes, but I should give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call again\""
"yes, <HEADNOD/> it's hard not to complain when you are sick"
"\"Loneliness is hard. Maybe you should give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call.\""
"I don't want to talk about this anymore "
"I don't want to talk about this anymore"
"\"Oh, that's good to know | That is good news! | I bet you are glad for \"+(pronounObj)"
"No, it's going to be a long time yet"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> sorry to hear that <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"\"I'm not sure. I haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\" for a while\""
"<FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> I hope the illness is not serious <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> Oh, that's really tough <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"\"I see. You could give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call or talk to \"+(pronounObj)+\" by video call\""
"(pronounSubj)+\" is postponing a visit to me\""
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> Oh, that's too bad. Any chance of a visit later? <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"\"if you haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\", why don't you give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call?\""
"\"if you haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\", why don't you give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call?\""
"\"I'm hoping \"+(pronounSubj)+\" will find another one soon\""
"Yes, that would make a big difference"
"It's really tough. It's not easy finding a job these days."
"So I hear. Well, let's hope for the best"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> oh dear. Can you go visit? <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> well that's tough. Can you go visit? <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"I'm sure a phone call will be much appreciated"
"\"No, but \"+(pronounSubj)+\" got kind of shook up by it\""
"That sounds like a good thing to do"
"How about a nice card? It's always great to get those"
"you can pick it up the next time you go for a walk."
"well, I think that would be good to do. "
"how about a nice card? You can pick one up when you go out"
"I don't really want to talk about it"
"Yes, I am going to send my condolences"
" <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> Please accept my condolences <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>"
"\"well, I'm sure \"+(famFriendName)+\" would like hearing from you\""
"\"Perhaps you should get in touch with \"+(pronounObj)"
"Well, keep calling. I think it helps."
"tell me the next time we update your calendar."
"Remind me the next time we work on your calendar"
